title: Re-Broadcast: Maintain Your Hair For Life | William Gaunitz
description:
Today, we’re revisiting an episode that speaks to so many. Hair loss can be traumatic, even more so when you don't understand why it's happening. Trichologist William Gaunitz has trained in London at the International Association of Trichology and is a certified trichologist with the World Trichology Society in New York City. He has studied Diagnostics in France and Hair Loss Treatment in Australia. He shares his experiences and insights on the multiple causes of hair loss and the solutions that he found works with his clients.

On Thursdays, I will be doing a bonus episode where my friends and I will discuss some of our own personal discoveries and opinions on beauty, health and wellness.

And I also want to hear from you. Share some of your aha moments on beauty, health and wellness, and have a discussion. If you're on Apple podcasts, write your aha moment in the comment section. Or you can email me at beautyuncovered@olaplex.com. And maybe you could be chosen to be a guest on our Thursday discussion panel.
